org.wiigee.control
Class WiimoteStreamer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.wiigee.control.WiimoteStreamer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WiimoteStreamer
extends java.lang.Thread

This class listens to data sent by the wiimote and generates specific events for acceleration, buttonpress, ... and extensions WiiMotionPlus and Nunchuk

Author:
Benjamin 'BePo' Poppinga, updated by Santiago Hors Fraile

handleInfraredData

private void handleInfraredData(byte[] data)
Handles the raw infrared data, containing the spot positions and the intensities of the spots. At the moment only the 12 Byte irda raw data is supported.

Parameters:
data - 12 Bytes of raw irda data.
